tool.name: Plot NMR
tool.help:
This tool plots the T-test or ANOVA results as colours on a mean spectrum. Given an NMR spectra file it calculates the mean spectrum and plots the selected interval of it. The plot is coloured based on the results of a statistical test performed on the spectra after binning. The tool requires the **pattern file** used for binning the data and the results of the performed test.
**Colour the spectra**
**Discrete** - colours the spectra in discrete intervals: [0, 0.001]; (0.001, 0.01]; (0.01, 0.05]; (0.05, 1]
**Continuous** - colours the plot in a contunuous fashion based on p-values in the interval [0,1]
.. class:: warningmark
The continuous plot is much harder to interpret and will likely be changed in the future.
